title: I got 253 marks in Tallentex 2020 in class 9. Which rank can I get? - Quora

response.answer_text: See Tallentex is just a basic aptitude exam, not the JEE/NEET exam you are actually preparing for. It just explains that you have a certain aptitude for the JEE/NEET exams and are in no sort the rank explanations anyway. It is no way an index for rank. I personally know people with near 260 scores who’ve not been even in the top 50 k of India whilst I someone with just 198 made an AIR 703 in JEEA 2019. So I guess there cannot be a clearer explanation to this. Regarding rank, nothing cannot be ascertained until say November of your XII(Which is again a bit not accurate). All I will advice is take up some good coaching; prepare and try to make a great rank. Rather than calculating your rank already.
